string.text: \n Display trajectory prediction when throwing grenades.\n
\n Show trajectory prediction when using grenade launchers.\n

Disable: [Fire] - active. [Aim] - cancel.
 Enable: [Switch grenade launcher] - active. [Reload] - cancel.
 
 [Use] - recover placed traps. (Staying within 2 meters from the grenade end of the trap. Aim at the grenade.)

Note: 
• Deployed drones will disappear when leaving the current zone. 
• Hostile stalkers will shoot drones when getting close. 
• Mutants will be alert when drones getting close. 
• When drones being shotdown, explosive won't detonate and will disappear. 
 
Movement: 
 Key [Sprint] -> Fly up. 
 Key [Crouch] -> Fly down. 
 Key [Forward] -> Fly forward. 
 Key [Backward] -> Fly backward. 
 Key [Strafe left] -> Strafe left. 
 Key [Strafe right] -> Strafe right. 
 Key [Lean left] -> Steer left. 
 Key [Lean right] -> Steer right. 
 
Action: 
 Key [Use] -> Stop controlling drone. 
 Key [Zoom] -> Camera zoom, supports both hold and toggle modes.
